name: Nimble Dodge
summary: You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

name: Overextending Feint
summary: You goad a foe into overextending.

name: Plant Evidence
summary: You can put a single item you’re holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing by succeeding at a Thievery check against their Perception DC.

name: Trap Finder
summary: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the presence of traps.

name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
summary: You tumble under and behind your foe, your rapid movement letting you catch them off guard.

name: Twin Feint
summary: You use an attack with one weapon to distract your foe from a second attack coming at a different angle.

name: You're Next
summary: After downing a foe, you menace another.

name: Brutal Beating
summary: Your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

name: Clever Gambit
summary: Your battle tactics are aided by assessing your foe’s capabilities and range.

name: Distracting Feint
summary: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal.

name: Fane's Fourberie
summary: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

name: Minor Magic
summary: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

name: Mobility
summary: You move without leaving an opening.

name: Quick Draw
summary: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Strong Arm
summary: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon’s range increment increases by 10 feet.

name: Unbalancing Blow
summary: Interweaving attacks, you unbalance your foes.

name: Underhanded Assault
summary: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

name: Battle Assessment
summary: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

name: Devrin's Dazzling Diversion
summary: Devrin Arlos has a habit of using whatever is at hand to temporarily blind others in combat.

name: Dread Striker
summary: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

name: Head Stomp
summary: Make an unarmed melee Strike against a prone target.

name: Magical Trickster
summary: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

name: Mug
summary: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

name: Poison Weapon
summary: You apply a contact poison or injury poison to the required weapon; if you have a free hand, you can Interact to draw a poison as part of this action.

name: Predictable!
summary: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

name: Reactive Pursuit
summary: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Sabotage
summary: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

name: Scoundrel's Surprise
summary: You drop your disguise at the right moment and surprise your target.

name: Scout's Warning
summary: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

name: The Harder They Fall (Rogue)
summary: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

name: Twin Distraction
summary: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

name: Analyze Weakness
summary: Your knowledge of a creature’s physiology helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Anticipate Ambush
summary: You keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel Speed.

name: Far Throw
summary: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

name: Gang Up
summary: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

name: Light Step
summary: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

name: Shove Down
summary: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

name: Skirmish Strike
summary: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

name: Slice and Swipe
summary: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

name: Sly Disarm
summary: You can Disarm a creature through sleight of hand rather than brute force.

name: Stella's Stab and Snag
summary: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement.

name: Twist The Knife
summary: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

name: Watch Your Back
summary: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

name: Ambushing Knockdown
summary: You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground.

name: Blind-Fight
summary: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Bullseye
summary: You carefully take aim to avoid your foe’s concealment and cover.

name: Delay Trap
summary: You try to jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects.

name: Improved Poison Weapon
summary: You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects.

name: Inspired Stratagem
summary: During your daily preparations, you can review stratagems for the day’s adventures with up to five allies.

name: Loaner Spell
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
summary: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

name: Nimble Roll
summary: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

name: Opportune Backstab
summary: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
summary: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
summary: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Sidestep
summary: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue.

name: Sly Striker
summary: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t off-guard.

name: Subtle Shank
summary: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

name: Swipe Souvenir
summary: When you wriggle free from an enemy’s grasp, you take something of theirs with you.

name: Tactical Entry
summary: You Stride.

name: Dazzling Display
summary: You perform a bewildering show of prowess, such as by whirling and flashing a weapon, that unnerves foes.

name: Deny Support
summary: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

name: Eldritch Debilitations
summary: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

name: Methodical Debilitations
summary: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy’s tactical advantages.

name: Nimble Strike
summary: You’re cunning enough to find an opening in an opponent’s attack.

name: Precise Debilitations
summary: You attack with great precision.

name: Sneak Adept
summary: It’s almost impossible to spot you.

name: Tactical Debilitations
summary: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

name: Vicious Debilitations
summary: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

name: Bloody Debilitation
summary: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

name: Coordinated Distraction
summary: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

name: Critical Debilitation
summary: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

name: Critical Debilitations
summary: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

name: Deadly Poison Weapon
summary: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

name: Fantastic Leap
summary: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

name: Felling Shot
summary: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

name: Preparation
summary: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

name: Reactive Interference
summary: Grabbing a sleeve, swiping with your weapon, or creating another obstruction, you reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

name: Ricochet Feint
summary: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

name: Spring from the Shadows
summary: You leap from hiding and assail your target.

name: Defensive Roll
summary: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

name: Instant Opening
summary: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

name: Leave An Opening
summary: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

name: Sense the Unseen
summary: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues, such as their minute movements or the shifting of air currents on your skin.

name: Stay Down!
summary: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

name: Blank Slate
summary: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful magic that could spy on you.

name: Cloud Step
summary: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

name: Cognitive Loophole
summary: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

name: Dispelling Slice
summary: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

name: Perfect Distraction
summary: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away.

name: Reconstruct The Scene
summary: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

name: Steal Spell
summary: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

name: Swift Elusion
summary: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe’s Reflex DC.

name: Implausible Infiltration
summary: You find tiny imperfections and somehow fit yourself through them, possibly moving directly through the wall or floor.

name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
summary: You can use Prescient Planner even if you have already used it after purchasing goods, and you can Interact to draw the item as a single action instead of a 2-action activity.

name: Powerful Sneak
summary: You’ve learned to exploit your enemies’ openings.

name: Trickster's Ace
summary: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

name: Enduring Debilitation
summary: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

name: Extradimensional Stash
summary: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

name: Hidden Paragon
summary: When you slip out of sight, you disappear.

name: Impossible Striker
summary: Nothing can prevent you from making a sneak attack, even if your opponent can see every blow coming.

name: Reactive Distraction
summary: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

name: Steal Essence
prerequisite: legendary in Thievery or master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
summary: Being in the presence of the _aeon orbs_ as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.
